Elixir.NAME: Elixir
DESCRIPTIONS: #yExaure todos as #yCondições e #yMaldições de sua mão.

Explosive Potion.NAME: Poção de Explosão
DESCRIPTIONS: de dano a TODOS os inimigos.

Potion Slot.NAME: Espaço de Poções
DESCRIPTIONS: Use poções durante combates para receber #gbônus ou #rafetar seus inimigos.

Regen Potion.NAME: Poção de Regeneração
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPV no fim de cada turno por #b

SkillPotion.NAME: Skill Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a random Skill card to your hand, it costs #b0.

AttackPotion.NAME: Attack Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a random Attack card to your hand, it costs #b0.

PowerPotion.NAME: Potion Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a random Power card to your hand, it costs #b0.

SteroidPotion.NAME: Steroid  Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Strength. At the end of your turn, lose #b

SpeedPotion.NAME: Speed  Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Dexterity. At the end of your turn, lose #b

GamblersBrew.NAME: Gambler's Brew
DESCRIPTIONS: Discard any number of cards then draw that many.

FairyPotion.NAME: Fairy Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, heal to #b10% of your Max HP instead and discard this potion.

SmokeBomb.NAME: Smoke Bomb
DESCRIPTIONS: Escape from a non-boss combat. Receive no rewards.

EntropicBrew.NAME: Entropic Brew
DESCRIPTIONS: Fill all your empty potion slots with random potions.
